title: Pixel 2XL fingerprint scanner stopped working out of the blue, what now?
content:
Yesterday my fingerprint scanner stopped working out of the blue,
I did not drop my Pixel 2 XL nor get it wet.
My Pixel itself seems not to recognize any activity from the fingerprint scanner and third party apps say I don't have the necessary hardware.
I have tried starting up in safe mode as well as factory resetting to no avail,
What do I do now?
